roleset.name: tear
roleset.note: REND-V NOTES: Based on Brown. Member of VNcls break-45.1. (from rend.01-v)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: And while Chuck Schumer bunks on work nights with three fellow congressmen in this rowhouse and other freshmen senators rent small apartments -- I got two bedrooms and a sofa bed so my children can come when they feel like it , Hillary and her husband buy a new $ 2.8 million mansion .
example.arg: I got two bedrooms and a sofa bed so my children can come when they feel like it
